data.name: The Endless Summer Surfing Challenge
data.detailed_description: If you own The Endless Summer Search For Surf you don't need to buy this game. For everyone else, welcome to the most exciting realistic surfing physics simulation challenge game you ever had the opportunity to play. Surf your way through the 12 surf spots of increasing difficulty. Complete the levels by scoring off the lips, tube rides, airs, fast rides, and shoot the pier. Change players and play with different surfers riding different boards, from a big gun power surfer to a lightweight fast short board. You'll be doing airs like a pro in no time, and develop your own surfing style in this surfing simulation. Play with a friend and compete in customizable surf contests like the pro surfing circuit.
data.about_the_game: If you own The Endless Summer Search For Surf you don't need to buy this game. For everyone else, welcome to the most exciting realistic surfing physics simulation challenge game you ever had the opportunity to play. Surf your way through the 12 surf spots of increasing difficulty. Complete the levels by scoring off the lips, tube rides, airs, fast rides, and shoot the pier. Change players and play with different surfers riding different boards, from a big gun power surfer to a lightweight fast short board. You'll be doing airs like a pro in no time, and develop your own surfing style in this surfing simulation. Play with a friend and compete in customizable surf contests like the pro surfing circuit.
data.short_description: A realistic physics based surfing simulation. Complete the 12 challenge rounds with a choice of 5 different surfers or a body boarder. Compete in two player timed and scored contests with two players surfing at the same time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core Process or i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 710
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: properly functioning sound
  • Additional Notes: Will work on Steam devices
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Will work on Steam devices

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Storage: 3 GB available space
